tasks.label: publish
tasks.command:
cls
dotnet build -c Release
if (Test-Path -Path "Output") {rm -R "Output"}
mkdir "Output\kebinImports\Editor\Scripts" > $null
mkdir "Output\kebinImports\Editor\Resources" > $null
cp -R "Editor\Scripts\info.json" "Output\kebinImports\Editor\Scripts\info.json" > $null
cp -R "Editor\Resources\*" "Output\kebinImports\Editor\Resources" > $null
cp -R "bin\Release\net471\kebinImports.dll" "Output\kebinImports\Editor\Scripts\kebinImports.dll" > $null
cp -R "LICENSE" "Output\kebinImports\LICENSE" > $null
cp -R "CHANGELOG" "Output\kebinImports\CHANGELOG" > $null
rm -R bin
rm -R obj
